info.title: Public Substation API for the Smart Service Intelligent Autonomous Grid
info.description: Public API for registered users to access the device data, production data on a device, bay or substation base.

200.description: List of all substations owned by a client. ClientId is proided after authorization. All the below GET requests are working on the same philosophy.
Substation data idetified by {substationId}
All bay data idetified by {substationId}
All device data idetified by {substationId}
List of all bays owned by a client
Bay data idetified by {bayId}
All device data idetified by {bayId}
List of all device owned by a client
Device data idetified by {deviceId}
Total list of different timeseries of a substation could produce for a client
